title: Mundo Quality of Life updates pls
body:
Just wondering if we can get tooltip updates for Mundo, I personally like seeing all the stats and knowing how much health regen I get when playing Garen (which is rare admittedly, but still), and Mundo is another main for me and I really dislike not knowing how much health regen I get from my passive and ultimate.

If you could implement that as a hotfix or even for next patch that would be awesome!

replies.body: I played mundo jg a few games ago and thought exactly this when I moused over his passive.
